Producer: Francois Ivernel, Andrew Levitas, Michael London, Janice Williams
Production Co: Groundswell Productions, The Sundance Institute, Montebello Productions
Rating: R (Pervasive Language|Epithets Throughout|Disturbing Racial Violence|Some Crude Sexual Material)
Synopsis: A Nigerian boy, "farmed out" by his parents to a white British family, becomes the leader of a skinhead gang.
Title: Farming
